name: salesphere
description: SaleSphere is a blockchain-based decentralized sales management system designed to bring transparency, security, and efficiency to sales, inventory data management.

scripts.build: npm run format && npx hardhat compile
scripts.test: npm run build && REPORT_GAS=true npx hardhat test
scripts.deploy:SaleSphere:local: npm run test && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/SaleSphere.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:SaleSphere: npm run test && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/SaleSphere.ts --network lisk-sepolia --verify
